Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1986...
Injured on 4/29/1986 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/11/1987, off Louis Sacco (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/31/1988, off Clarence Amburgey (HAL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Malibu on 4/26/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1992, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
